summary: When straight arrow FBI agent Roy Clayton heads up the investigation into a dangerous international conspiracy, all clues seem to lead back to former U.S. Special Operations officer, Samir Horn.
cast: Don Cheadle|Guy Pearce|Saïd Taghmaoui|Neal McDonough|Alyy Khan|Archie Panjabi|Raad Rawi|Hassam Ghancy|Mozhan Marnò|Adeel Akhtar|Jeff Daniels|Lorena Gale|Scali Delpeyrat|Mehdi Ortelsberg|Abdelkader Aizzoune|Mohamed Choubi|Farid Regragui|Habib Hamdane|Youness Sardi|Joseph Beddelem|Alaa Safi|Tom Barnett|Simon Reynolds|Matt Gordon|P. Rodney Barnes|Shahla Kareen|Ali Momen|Paulino Nunes|Alexandra Castillo|Jeff Kassel|Mike McPhaden|Dani Jazzar|Jonathan Walker|José Heuzé|Scott Wickware|Elias Zarou|Catherine Galloway|Myriam Blanckaert|Nick Alachiotis|Alex Poch-Goldin|Natasha Roy|Yassine Mamadou|Omar Mamadou|Mostafa Hnini|Michaël Troude|Rodriguez Gelos|Ron Bell|Suzy Brack|David Clark|Sima Fisher|Robert Karn|John Rainone Jr.|Giota Trakas
title: Traidor
